records.uncertainty_note: Exact location of the tent is redacted.
records.context_note: A 44-year-old Iraqi man who arrived in Lesvos on September 6, 2017, was found dead in a tent on October 20, 2017. Initial assessment by a local doctor suggests the cause of death was a heart attack. An autopsy is planned.
records.evidence_quote: 44 years old Iraqi men who arrived in Lesvos on the 6th of September 2017 , has been found dead at in the tent in . [...] the person has died because of heart attack.

records.context_note: A SAR operation was launched on October 2, 2017, by JRCC Piraeus after a CPB (Coastal Patrol Boat) reported damage on its prow during navigation. The SAR operation involved escorting a boat with 5 estimated people on board to port. MRCC Ankara was informed.
records.evidence_quote: On 2 October at JRCC of Piraeus was informed that CPB during her navigation from [...] A SAR operation was launched under the coordination of IRCC Piraeus with the participation of [...] escorted the to port.

records.context_note: During a SAR operation on August 11, 2017, a CBV (Coastal Border Vessel) identified a small migrant vessel (rubber boat) with 23 migrants. A transfer of migrants was commenced, during which a crew member suffered small injuries to his leg.
records.evidence_quote: CBV crew member injured during a SAR operation. [...] During this SAR operation a suffered small injures in one of his legs.

records.uncertainty_note: Operational area is redacted, no other location details provided.
records.context_note: On July 21, 2017, a Frontex FX crew member had a unilateral motorbike accident, resulting in one injured person. No other properties were involved.
records.evidence_quote: Unilateral traffic accident FX member. [...] On July 21st, around a FX had a motorbike accident by himself. No other properties were involved in the accident.

records.context_note: On July 17-18, 2017, approximately 50 migrants gathered in front of EASO facilities, leading to aggressive behavior, stone-throwing, and damage to vehicles. The facilities were evacuated, but the registration area was not initially. 20 protesters were arrested, and 10 people were injured, including 2 HP officers. Two new units of riot police were deployed.
records.evidence_quote: July the 17th, 2017, around , about 50 migrants gathered in front of the EASO facilities in . [...] There have been several injuries among protesters. 2 HP officers have been injured as well.
